title: OpenAI launches Atlas browser to compete with Google Chrome

title: Meta to lay off 600 in its AI division
description: Meta announced Wednesday that it is laying off 600 employees in its artificial intelligence division while still hiring for its superintelligence lab.
content:
Oct. 22 (UPI) -- Meta announced Wednesday that it is laying off 600 employees in its artificial intelligence division while still hiring for its artificial superintelligence division.

title: Ohio lawmaker proposes bill to ban marriage between humans and AI
description: Ohio Representative Thaddeus Claggett introduces House Bill 469 to ban AI marriage and classify artificial intelligence systems as nonsentient entities without legal rights.
content:
NEWYou can now listen to Fox News articles!
An Ohio lawmaker is taking aim at artificial intelligence in a way few expected. Rep. Thaddeus Claggett has introduced House Bill 469, which would make it illegal for AI systems to be treated like people. T... [8531 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence and Equity: This Entrepreneur Wants to Build AI for Everyone
description: I had a conversation with John Pasmore of Latimer AI on creating technology focused on inclusivity, cultural representation and reducing bias.
content:
When John Pasmore watched his 16-year-old son playing around with AI, he recognized "how much bias" was built into the system.
On platforms like Twitter and X, Pasmore witnessed people react to AI-generated racist comments with humor. But the lack of... [7186 chars]

title: 600 jobs are already being cut from Alexandr Wang's superintelligence lab- Fast Company
description: According to a memo from Wang, the move means 'fewer conversations will be required to make a decision' as the tech giant ramps up artificial intelligence.
content:

title: GM unveils plans for ‘eyes-off’ vehicle
description: General Motors announced plans Wednesday to incorporate Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence platform into vehicles and to launch a vehicle capable of “eyes-off” driving in 2028.
content:
General Motors announced plans Wednesday to incorporate Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence platform into vehicles and to launch a vehicle capable of “eyes-off” driving in 2028.

title: The Pentagon is using artificial intelligence right now. Here's how.
description: In a new video series, Breaking Defense dives into the question of how, and why, the US military is turning to AI.
content:
Artificial intelligence is the future of the military, or so Pentagon leaders keep saying. But is it the future — or is that future already here?

title: Reddit sues Perplexity for scraping data to train AI system
description: Social media platform Reddit sued artificial intelligence startup Perplexity in New York federal court on Wednesday, accusing it and three other companies of unlawfully scraping its data to train Perplexity's AI-based search engine.
content: Oct 22 (Reuters) - Social media platform Reddit sued artificial intelligence startup Perplexity in New York federal court on Wednesday, accusing it and three other companies of unlawfully scraping its data to train Perplexity's AI-based search engine... [925 chars]
